name: InGnOrAnCe Is BlIsS
description: Are you an epic gamer? Well, I am an even more epic one, because I make games! Nah, these are games that I created while learning Click-team fusion 2.5, they might be glitchy or terrible graphic, but I still wanted to share them with you, most use the standard arrow keys, only the first game require the mouse, otherwise the game will tell you what to use, I even have a death count on how many times you die while completing the game, if you can't past a level press A and to restart the current level you're on just hit the R button...
